name: AirWash Dry Shampoo
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Dry Shampoo
about: What it is: A non-aerosol dry shampoo mist that lasts up to 3 days* using patented odorBIND biotechnology to deliver a high-performance clean without excess buildup, white cast, or heavy fragrances...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:- Oily Scalp.- Scalp Build Up.- Volumizing..Key Benefits: - Newly patented smart-release odorBIND biotechnology uniquely recognizes, traps, and eliminates odor-causing molecules.- Absorbs oil without starchy buildup or white cast, for hair that feels day-one clean.- Scalp-friendly formula supports scalp-sebum balance to promote scalp health between washes..Highlighted Ingredients:- Translucent Microbeads: Effectively absorb oil without feeling gritty, and without white cast..- odorBIND biotechnology: Patented K18 technology recognizes, traps, and eliminates odor..- Biotech-Derived Mediterranean Microalgae: Helps balance scalp and controls excess oil production over time...Ingredient Callouts: It is gluten-free and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This is the reinvention of dry shampoo, the future of clean, powered by biotech. This non-aerosol dry shampoo is clinically proven to eliminate odor and reduce oil for up to 3 days. Newly patented odorBIND smart-release biotechnology uses inspiration from nature to detect and clinically eliminate odors while translucent microbeads absorb excess oil, without leaving behind a visible starchy buildup or white cast. Scalp friendly formula helps balance sebum and supports scalp health overtime..This formula may feel slightly damp when applied but will not revert your style. AirWash is highly concentrated so less is more. Apply just 1-3 sprays per section and build as needed...Fragrance Description: This dry shampoo has a subtle, fresh, and clean floral scent..Clinical Results: Results observed in a consumer test of 30 subjects after 4 weeks when asked how many days longer they could go between washes when compared to their usual dry shampoo:.- Go 3 days longer between washes..Results observed in a scientific test of 30 subjects after 1 use of AirWash Dry Shampoo, after 72 hours:.- Clinically shown to reduce oil and eliminate odor.- Keeps working for up to three days..Results observed in a consumer test of 30 subjects after 3 weeks of using Airwash Dry Shampoo:.- 100% agree hair and scalp look and feel healthy..
ingredients: -Translucent Microbeads: Effectively absorb oil without feeling gritty, and without white cast..-odorBIND biotechnology: Patented K18 technology recognizes, traps, and eliminates odor.-Biotech-Derived Mediterranean Microalgae: Helps balance scalp and controls excess oil production over time....Water (Aqua) (Eau), Alcohol Denat., Silica, Tetraselmis Suecica Extract, Arginine, Lactic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycerin, Mannitol, Gellan Gum, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Phytate, Tromethamine, Escherichia Coli Extract/Sr-(Methionyl Tripeptide-46 Hexapeptide-40 Decapeptide-27 Methionyl S-Pig Polypeptide-2 Oligopeptide-234 Sh-Oligopeptide-78), Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Fragrance (Parfum), Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Benzyl Alcohol....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..-Shake well..-Non-aerosol format may feel slightly damp but will not disturb your style..-Hold the bottle four to six inches away from scalp for even distribution..-Section hair and apply just 1 spray per section. Less is more. Add only as needed..-Massage in and brush or style as usual..-If the hair feels gritty or powdery, you may have applied too much product. Brush hair to distribute the product, or reset hair with an in-shower shampoo.
